activity.title: ohcnetwork/docs#126
activity.text:
Define Target Personas: Identify and document the various user personas relevant to CARE, mainly:
Healthcare administrators, Clinicians, Doctors
Open-source contributors

Topic Ideation: Develop a list of content topics that address the pain points and interests of your personas.

Medium Article: Craft a comprehensive article on Medium detailing CARE's mission, features, and impact.

Reach out to news outlets, especially BBC StoryWorks, Aljazeera Health, and Reuters MedTech/Future of Health to feature stories about CARE.

Guest Posts: Contribute articles to reputable healthcare and technology blogs, linking back to CARE's website.

Google My Business Profile.

Plan the publication schedule: Frequent, ad-hoc/ spontaneous content sharing style.
